CS:GO bunnyhop ez~ Let's go to Global Elite!

It's like Call of Duty but better.  
By that I mean if I put 30 bullets into you (call of duty), I expect you to die, and you will.

but if I put 4 bullets into you (cs:go), I also expect you to die, and you will.

Custom mode, custom maps, custom guns, custom everything.  Can have bots fill a team or to practice, special events and unlocks.  It's counter strike, what's not to like about it?

Edit: I should note here that whatever my "time played" blah blah, I have over 15 years playing CS as its grown even more time developing maps.

Worst hit reg i've seen on a modern shooter and how can a game with a competitive scene like this have so many hackers. Rank doesn't matter, specially if you don't have prime you are bound to find hackers.

You can literally never get sick of this game. Sometimes it gets boring and I quit the game for a few months for another game, but I'll always come back to CS. 10/10 would recommend as long as you have the right mindset(don't rage too easily b/c of hackers and trolls).
